version_description:
- Improved notifications
- Spotlight integration & full text search
- Better Attachment handling
- In-App Browser & Google Chrome support
- New notification & sent message sounds
- Improved compatibility with GoDaddy and Yahoo accounts
- Bugfixes and performance improvements

- Improved notifications
- Spotlight integration & full text search
- Better Attachment handling
- In-App Browser & Google Chrome support
- New notification & sent message sounds
- Improved compatibility with GoDaddy and Yahoo accounts
- Bugfixes and performance improvements

- Improved notifications
- Spotlight integration & full text search
- Better Attachment handling
- In-App Browser & Google Chrome support
- New notification & sent message sounds
- Improved compatibility with GoDaddy and Yahoo accounts
- Bugfixes and performance improvements

- Bugfix for done button in calendar preview
- Improved iOS 10 compatibility
- Bugfix for timeout error that occurs with some providers and self-hosted servers.

- Bugfix for done button in calendar preview

- Bugfix for timeout error that occurs with some providers and self-hosted servers.

- iOS 12 compatibility
- Improved iPhone X* support
- Bugfixes for display issues like scrolling within emails
- Fixing a crash when scrolling through emails quickly

* Improved Notifications:
  - Show the sender as title in the notification
  - Notifications should be delivered more reliably now
* Bugfix for duplicated images in forwarded emails
* Bugfix for wrong formatting in quoted emails of reply mails
* Bugfix for a crash when typing emojis
* Bugfix for a display issue and some more crashes
